title: Thank you gruffalowdown
body: I would just like to thank a Riot support member for helping me resolve a major issue that has been happening with my in-game chat. He was very patient and tried to find many solutions to help me.

replies.body:
Ayyyyyyy our techs love getting these shoutouts xD!!! I'll be sure to pass this along ^_^

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
